rating.title: Rate my App
rating.subtitle: Your feedback helps me improve the app

twoStars.title: Oops, room for improvement!
twoStars.subtitle: What can I do better? I'm all ears!

threeStars.title: Not bad, right?

fourStars.title: Almost perfect!
fourStars.subtitle: Just one star missing – what would it take?

fiveStars.title: WOW! You're the best!
fiveStars.subtitle: Would you spoil me on the Play Store too?

negative.title: Thanks for your honesty!

options.idea: I have an idea for the app

detail.title: Your Feedback
detail.placeholderExperience: Tell me more about your experience...

sent.title: Thank you!

queued.title: Feedback saved!
queued.subtitle: Your feedback will be sent automatically when you're back online.

sendFailed.title: Feedback could not be sent

generic.title: An error occurred

autoNotesWarning: When using auto-notes, this game will not count towards statistics or level progress.
